text: Kalavarkey is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Rajesh Narayanan, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Vijayaraghavan in the lead role. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kalavarkey * RSK Manikandan as Rajappan * Babu Joseph * Idavela Babu as Vishnu * Indrans as Moosakka * Jeeja Surendran as Pavithran's wife * Jijoy Rajagopal as Rishi * Krishnendu as Lisy * Lissy Jose as Omana * Manasi * Meenakshi * Midhun * Monilal as Kuttappan *Najeeb as Gopi * Pallavi as Annamma * Saju Kodiyan as Pavithran * Suvarna Mathew as Alice * Swapna Unni as Sophie * Vijayaraghavan as Jose ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalavarkey
